## What if we want a histogram of change over time? 
  
```{r hist of change}  

plotDat = mpg %>% group_by(year, model) %>%
  summarize(hwy = mean(hwy))

ggplot(plotDat, aes(x=year, y = hwy, group = model)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line()+
  ylab('miles per gallon') + 
  xlab('year') +
  ggtitle("fuel efficiency over time")
```
